My Hyprland setup
=================

These dotfile add stuff Wayland.
`tty1` start Hyprland.

# Dependencies


## For Wayland

- Hypridle
- Hyprland
- Hyprlock
- wofi
- xdg-desktop-portal-hyprland-git
- alacritty
- barriers
- calcurse
- dunst
- mpc
- mpd
- spotifyd
- tmux
- udiskie
- zathura
- zsh


# Software not done yet

- Hyprland
- Hyprlock
- calcurse
- ncmpcpp
- newsboat
- tmux
- waybar
- wofi
- zathura

# Missing software

passmenu
passotp
